data.message: The report link doesn't do anything....

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Blake. If you've reported something for violating Facebook Terms and haven't received a response, you might be able to check the status of your report in the Support Dashboard here: http://bit.ly/2dGA1hU. -Joe

Facebook it's not that i have done that and received a report stating what i know to be a fact of violation.  but the response i received was that it doesn't.  i was trying to report a very blatant fake facebook page. there's nothing that can be done about those.  facebook does nothing for users in that respects. i do apologize if i sound mean but it's true.   you need more options for reporting.
using that link does not help any
